reviewText: two yrs after the film debut this show was released its boring and made no connection to the film that its based on other than having the main character use milla likeness in anime style but the voice actress is very annoying and they completely change the character the story also gets boring and some episodes doesn't make any sense plus its one season before this got cancelled thank god lol this show pretty much killed it off to already finished movie that wasn't gonna get a sequel anyway due to disagreement that milla had the creator of ultraviolet i didn't see any potential in this anime that based on somewhat successful movie this show is so bad alot of ppl thats fans of the movie didn't know there was a show after the film
